name: Jungle Jam (ericshealy885)
description:
Pirates have stolen the gem of the jungle king! The jungle’s ancient guardians have tasked you with the gem’s retrieval. To aid you in this endeavor, they have granted you the power of reincarnation. Each time you die, your body is renewed with gifts to help you wreak the jungle’s vengeance.

Controls

A/D or left/right: Movement

mouse click: Attack

Z: Grab

W/S or up/down: climb

Q/E/R: Special abilities

Credits

Eric Shealy: Game Designer

Great Redi: Main Artist

Ducky: Background Designer

Vijay Kumar: Level and Game Designer

Rainy Flower: Sound Designer

Ian Isop: Programmer
